title: 'Initial Impressions - Quality is Good for the Price (Rs. 278/-) (Size: 800mm x 30mm x 4mm)'
body: The mousepad is good as far as the touch and feel of the material goes, especially considering the price point. However, the size advertised is not entirely accurate, and the mat's length falls short by 20 mm (actual size is 780 mm instead of the advertised 800 mm).  Other aspects - Stitching, finishing and print quality - Good On time delivery (as quoted) and packaging - Good  PS: Not assessed thoroughly for extreme gaming. This is only the first impression.
